name: speedtyper-solo
description: Personal typing practice tool for coding snippets (solo fork of speedtyper.dev)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,browser -c blue,green,magenta "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run open-browser"
scripts.reimport: cd packages/back-nest && npm run command import-local-snippets
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run reset-db

author: Fork for solo practice
